reachOutDirectly: Reach out directly for help and support
faqQuestion1: How can I get general support?
faqAnswer1: You can reach out through our various channels including mentors, community forums, or visit us in person.
faqAnswer2: We support multiple languages including German, English, Arabic, Persian, and more.
faqQuestion3: How can I contact a mentor?
faqAnswer3: You can contact mentors through WhatsApp, Signal, Telegram, Facebook, email, or phone.
faqQuestion4: Where can I visit in person?
faqAnswer4: We have offices in all Austrian states. Select your state to see the specific address.
